instructions: From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under 'QUICK SETTINGS,' tap Wi-Fi . Tap the Wi-Fi switch to ON . Touch and hold the Wi-Fi network you wish to delete. Tap Forget network .

From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under 'QUICK SETTINGS,' tap Wi-Fi . Tap the Wi-Fi switch to ON . A list of networks populates. Tap Scan to find a network that does not display. Tap the plus sign to add a Wi-Fi network that does not display. Tap the desired Wi-Fi network you want to connect to. If necessary, enter the password. Tap Connect .
From any home screen, tap Apps . Tap Settings . Under QUICK SETTINGS , tap Wi-Fi . Tap the Wi-Fi switch to ON / OFF .
